name: Umibōzu
description:
Umibōzu and figments of my imagination is a short atmospheric horror experience. Will you catch your train?

Note from the developer:

This game is intended to be played using the high graphical settings, these can be set within the main menu. 

This is my first game, and I mainly used it's development to broaden my skillset, please take this into consideration! I hope you enjoy!

If you encounter any bugs or problems feel free to let me know.

Controls: WMove Forwards
ATurn Left
SMove BackwardsDTurn RightLeft ControlCrouch (First Person Only)FToggle FlashlightEInteractJToggle JournalEscapeToggle Pause Menu
